statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY average_transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM wind_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM wind_energy_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM wind_energy_projects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM wind_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name FROM wind_energy_projects WHERE project_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM wind_energy_projects WHERE project_location = 'California';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location, project_start_date FROM wind_energy_projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, transaction_amount FROM wind_energy_projects JOIN financial_transactions ON wind_energy_projects.project_id = financial_transactions.project_id WHERE transaction_type = 'investment';
SELECT project_name, project_location, transaction_amount FROM wind_energy_projects LEFT JOIN financial_transactions ON wind_energy_projects.project_id = financial_transactions.project_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, project_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_generation WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM wind_energy_projects ORDER BY project_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM wind_energy_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT revenue_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_generation WHERE revenue_amount < 5000 ORDER BY revenue_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_capacity FROM wind_energy_projects WHERE project_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY project_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions JOIN revenue_generation ON financial_transactions.project_id = revenue_generation.project_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM projects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 10000;
SELECT production_id, project_id, energy_generated FROM energy_production WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND energy_generated > 500;
SELECT project_id, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects WHERE project_start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM projects WHERE project_start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_start_date;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue, project_id FROM revenue GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(energy_generated) AS total_energy_generated FROM energy_production GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_energy_generated > 5000 ORDER BY total_energy_generated DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, capacity FROM WindEnergyProjects;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, capacity, location FROM WindEnergyProjects ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM WindEnergyProjects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT revenue_date, revenue_amount FROM Revenue ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindEnergyProjects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM WindEnergyProjects WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT project_name, capacity, location FROM WindEnergyProjects WHERE capacity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT project_name, capacity FROM WindEnergyProjects ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM WindEnergyProjects JOIN Revenue ON WindEnergyProjects.project_id = Revenue.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
